description: The X-Investors project aims to educate the MultiversX community and assist members in making informed investment decisions. As the utility token of the project, INVX plays a crucial role in engaging and rewarding the community. It offers staking rewards as an incentive for holding tokens, enables participation in exclusive NFT lotteries, provides governance voting rights for decision-making within the ecosystem, and rewards members for their active involvement in learning initiatives. INVX is more than just a token; it is a tool for empowerment, education, and community development within the MultiversX ecosystem.
